modName: Theminblacks Barbarian armor for UNP Top Model with TBBP
summary: This is a conversion of the Barbarian Armor by Theminblack to the UNP Top Model Body with TBBP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=45]Theminblack's Barbarian Armor[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=35]For UNP Top Model[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=25]TBBP[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#FF99FF][size=20]Weight Slider Support[/size][/color][/center]


[color=#FF99FF]=========================================================================================== [/color]

[center][color=#FFCC00][size=42]Hello and welcome again friends![/size][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC] I am very pleased to bring you yet another armor conversion of one of my favorite armor sets.... Barbarian Armor by Theminblack![/color]

[center][color=#FFFF33][size=35]Please note:[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC]This file contains only the converted "cuirass/body/chest" armor mesh so you will still need the original mod for the boots, gloves and textures. It has some minor clipping and weight issues but nothing real noticeable or game breaking.[/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=#FF0000][u][size=50]Requirements![/size][/u][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Top Model Body[/url] by es2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Skeleton[/url] by XP32
(or another TBBP compatible skeleton)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]The TBBP animation of Dragonfly[/url] by Lecid (For the TBBP animations, you may be able to use this without it I don't know for sure so expect limited support).
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19004/?]Theminblacks Original[/url]


[center][color=#FF0000][u]Without a TBBP Compatible Skeleton you will Crash to Desktop!!!!![/u][/color][/center]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=#FF6600][size=15]Recommended [/size][/color]

Mods I use
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7093/?]No Maam Breathing Idles[/url] by Fore
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34508/?]360 Walk and Run Plus[/url] by yukl
[color=#FF6666]Use these for minimal clipping[/color]

[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
[size=30][color=#FFCC66]To Install[/color][/size]
Use NMM! Once you have the correct body and skeleton installed download and install Theminblack's original mod (Link above) and then install this mod and overwrite.

If you wish to manually install drop Theminblack's Data file into your skyrim Data folder followed by mine and overwrite when asked.


[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]

[size=30][color=#FFCC66]How to get in game[/color][/size]
Craftable at any forge under the Leather Category! If you have more than one "Barbarian armor" in that list this one has the default Leather armor image in the crafting menu.


[color=#CC33CC]============================================================================================
[/color]
